headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BRINKMANN, ELISABETH RSCJ

lead_paragraph: BRINKMANN--Elisabeth RSCJ, educator at the Convent of the Sacred Heart, died Tuesday, April 29. Born June 12, 1960 in Geneva, Switzerland, to Leo and Ursula Brinkmann, she is survived by her mother, Ursula Brinkmann of Austin, her sister, Anne Birch, and two brothers, Peter Brinkmann and Johannes Brinkmann. Her father predeceased her. Visit www.rscj.org. Funeral Mass 10:00am, Friday, May 9th, Convent of the Sacred Heart, 91st Street, New York. Burial in the Society of the Sacred Heart Cemetery at Kenwood in Albany, May 10.
